rules_text:
Flying, vigilance, deathtouch 
Whenever Selenia, False Hope becomes the target of a spell or ability, you may pay 2 life. If you do, Selenia phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]A cruel god's gift to a mad king.[/i]
